briefdescription.para: This method sets up the module output message of type :ref:CmdTorqueBodyMsgPayload

parameterdescription.para: The configuration data associated with this module
The ID associated with the configData

detaileddescription.para:
This method performs a complete reset of the module. Local module variables that retain time varying states between function calls are reset to their default values.
void
callTime
The clock time at which the function was called (nanoseconds)
configData
The configuration data associated with the MRP steering control
moduleID
The module identifier

listitem.para: zero and read in vehicle configuration message
zero the number of RW by default
check if RW configuration message exists
Read static RW config data message and store it in module variables
Reset the integral measure of the rate tracking error
Reset the prior time flag state. If zero, control time step not evaluated on the first function call

detaileddescription.para:
This method takes the attitude and rate errors relative to the Reference frame, as well as the reference frame angular rates and acceleration, and computes the required control torque Lr.
void
configData
The configuration data associated with the MRP Steering attitude control
callTime
The clock time at which the function was called (nanoseconds)
moduleID
The module identifier

listitem.para: Read the attitude tracking error message
read in optional RW speed and availability message
evaluate required attitude control torque Lr
set the output message and write it out
write the output integral feedback torque
